Celle resigns. He has fought off the mate, but his material and positional disadvantages render his position hopeless. Well done by Fischer! [He had a mate in 5 with 27 R-B4 ch K-K4 28 R-B5 ch K-K5 29 P-B3 ch K-K6 30 R-K5 ch K-B5 31 Q-B5 mate, but as this was a timed simul, he decided to play a move that would end the game immediately with a resignation.]
